transport.access_summary: Walk up from Great Malvern town to the main ridge paths.

ai.summary: A popular loop over North Hill in the Malvern Hills with far-reaching views over Worcestershire and Herefordshire.
ai.terrain_summary: Steady ascents on well-trodden paths, with some steeper, rocky sections near the ridge.
ai.safety_notes: Can be very exposed in high winds; carry layers and check the weather forecast.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, but especially good in clear spring and autumn weather.

seo.title: Malvern Hills North Hill Loop Hiking Route
seo.meta_description: Explore a scenic 7 km loop over North Hill in the Malvern Hills with superb views and moderate ascents.
